scheme_name: Financial Assistance for Education - Haryana Silicosis Board
description: The Financial Assistance for Education scheme by the Haryana Silicosis Board provides support to the children of silicosis victims or affected workers to cover educational expenses from primary to higher secondary levels. The scheme aims to ensure educational continuity for children of silicosis-affected families.
key_features: Financial support for children of silicosis victims
Covers primary to higher secondary education
Implemented by the Haryana Silicosis Board
Aims to reduce financial burden on affected families

benefits.assistance_amount: Varies based on educational level and board guidelines
benefits.coverage: School fees, books, uniforms, and other expenses

education_criteria: Children enrolled in primary, secondary, or higher secondary classes
Must be studying in recognized schools
additional_criteria: Parent must be a silicosis victim or affected worker registered with the Haryana Silicosis Board
Must be a resident of Haryana
institution_criteria: Government or recognized private schools in Haryana

steps: Obtain application form from the Haryana Silicosis Board office
Submit form with proof of silicosis certification and educational documents
application_process.note: Contact the board for application deadlines

special_notes: Assistance limited to children of registered silicosis victims
Amount varies based on educational level
Renewal requires proof of continued enrollment
